Reviews.Content: villa living was one of the hotels in an EVA tour package. they were really good. The guide came to pick me up, met up with my friends at the villa, free massage at hotel, free massage at some random place and they upgrade both of our rooms. i went with a couple so they stayed in a villa and i stayed in a villa... there was enough room to sleep 4 at my villafacilities: love villa living, had my own pool and outdoor shower and living/dining roombreakfast: butler cooked every morning--though could be a bit saltierlocation: okay location--to get to seminyak, need to take taxi buttaxi are cheap though a bit scarynear oberoi hotel strip
Reviews.Author: Taipeiworldlywise

Reviews.Content: don't go there We just got back from this villa recently, 4 member of our group all got diarrhea by eating the breakfast cooked by their staff. For the whole time we were there, we did not see any other guest beside our group ( 15 people).I believe initially this is a lovely place, but were not very well keep, pool in our unit (107) is dirty, dish has a layer of dust, many critters on the floor, and I must have killed 10 centipedes in one night. There are more bugs in bath room. All reported shower problem, no hot water or water suddenly hot and cold.On the way to the villa is like a roller coaster ride, the road is so bad I am sure we are going to flip over and there is absolute no scenery at all.
Reviews.Author: rbcski

Reviews.Content: forget it !       dont let the pretty bed fool you
Reviews.Author: battling
